page.title: 04Tourism in S.Clevedon&Kenn
page.content: Although South Clevedon and Kenn are not on the beach some people do come here for their {holidays.}Mainly because South Clevedon and Kenn is a good touring centre.{Weston Super Mare {Cheddar}the {Mendips}and the shopping at{Bristol}and{Bath}are within easy reach.There are two campsites at Kenn where people can stay.{Byways Caravan {Site}is in walking distance of the beaches.Near by is a river and you can go{fishing}if you feel like it.There is also a field in walking distance of the site where you can play all sorts of games like{football cricket}e.t.c. If you want to leave your pet when you go away the boarding kennels at{Bow {Cottage}will look after your dog,cat,horse and even tortoise.
